Subject: The Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

Koga Shuko/Anubis/Hades/Double 
Punch/Manterror/Injector/Sixshot/Unitron/Serpentor/Beachcomber/



Double Punch, in his cloaked mode, looked around for a moment.  "Attack the 
counter-attackers!"

"Why?  We aren't getting shot!  Let Koga Puko die!" Injector replied.

"If his troops die, what keeps them from attacking us?" Double Punch 
countered.

"Kill 'em, KILL 'EM ALL!" Injector yelled, firing 3 stinger missiles off at 
Rhinox.

Manterror fired two ion disks from both arm, two at Sniper, two at 
Beachcomber.

Double Punch chuckled madly, rolling to the left 5 feet, raising both 
pinchers, firing an energy-signature seeking missile from each pincher, one 
at Rhinox, one at Striker.

Anubis grunted as lasers struck into his armor.  Sidestepping, letting the 
rest of the laser fire go by, he fired an optic blast at Striker.

Hades raised his laser rifle, firing four bolts, two at Rhinox's back, then 
lower at his skid plates.

Unitron raised his rifles, firing three bolts from each, three heading for 
Rhinox, the rest heading for Beachcomber.

Koga Shuko fired four optic blasts, one at each rocket.  He braced himself, 
the shockwave nearly tumbling him over.  He fired a rocket off at Sniper's 
pelvis.

Sixshot transformed into his space fighter mode, lifting off into the air and 
gaining altitude.

---

Beachcomber yelled, rolling to the left, one ion disk missing, the other 
cutting into his right side.

---
